about_the_game:
Simple, Elegant, and Addictive – The Ultimate Sudoku Experience!

Dive into the world of 1 Rule Sudoku, where the classic number puzzle is reimagined with a fresh twist. Featuring endless, procedurally-generated puzzles, this minimalist yet deeply engaging game offers a perfect balance of challenge and relaxation.

How it Works:

The twist? One simple rule. That's right — forget about complex strategies and endless variations. Here, you only need to follow a single, easy-to-understand rule to solve each puzzle. As you play, the game adapts to your progress, offering an infinite array of puzzles that always feel fresh and exciting.

Endless Puzzles, Always New:

Never run out of puzzles to solve! With an infinite puzzle generator, no two games are the same. Each new puzzle offers a unique challenge, ensuring your brain stays sharp and your puzzle-solving skills keep evolving.

Level Up and Unlock:

As you solve more puzzles, you'll level up, earning rewards and unlocking beautiful new backgrounds to customize your experience. Whether you’re playing for a few minutes or hours, each puzzle solved brings you closer to new, stunning themes to brighten your game.

Perfect for All Skill Levels:

Whether you’re a Sudoku beginner or a seasoned pro, 1 Rule Sudoku offers a relaxing and rewarding experience for players of all levels. The simplicity of the rule combined with the complexity of the puzzle layout ensures you’ll always be engaged and entertained.

Key Features:

  • Infinite Procedurally-Generated Puzzles: Never run out of new challenges!

  • Simple, One-Rule Gameplay: Enjoy a minimalist and easy-to-learn experience.

  • Leveling System & Unlockable Backgrounds: Earn rewards and customize your game as you progress.

  • Charming and Relaxing Design: Beautiful, soothing visuals to enhance your gameplay.

  • Casual Yet Deep: Ideal for short play sessions or long puzzle-solving marathons.

Are you ready to test your logic, improve your puzzle-solving skills, and unlock beautiful new backgrounds along the way?

Start solving in 1 Rule Sudoku today — and experience Sudoku like never before!

name: 1 Rule Sudoku

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 3000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
